comments:
Description:
NPE throws out when add a Display Name key of Output Column if there is no Resource file[07]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070508-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a dataset
2, Turn to Output Columns
3, Edit a column and specify the Display Name Key
4, Click the Add button in Quick Add 

Actual result:
After step4, NPE throws out
Error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.io.File.<init>(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.ResourceEditDialog.addSelection(ResourceEditDialog.java:544)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.ResourceEditDialog.access$6(ResourceEditDialog.java:541)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.ResourceEditDialog$6.widgetSelected(ResourceEditDialog.java:506)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:227)
As per discussion we move this bug to RC2.
Test if there exists the specified resource, the button will now be disabled if otherwise
